USE LICENSE AGREEMENT FOR
POCKET AUCTIONS FOR EBAY

TERMS OF USE 

The following Use License Agreement ("Agreement") with Bonfire Media, Inc. ("BONFIRE") governs your use of BONFIRE's Pocket Auctions software and services for accessing information from and interacting with online auction sites, services, and marketplaces ("Marketplaces"). By clicking on the "I agree" button, you are consenting to be bound by the terms and conditions of this Agreement. We may amend this Agreement at any time by posting the amended terms on the BONFIRE website at www.bonfiremedia.com ("Site"). Except as stated below, all amended terms shall automatically be effective 15 days after they are initially posted on the Site.

LIMITED LICENSE

BONFIRE hereby grants to you a non-exclusive, non-transferable, limited license to install and use the Pocket Auctions object code ("Software") and services delivered through the Software ("Services") on one wireless communications device. The term "Licensed Materials" means, collectively, the Software and Services. All rights not expressly granted herein are reserved by BONFIRE. 

You agree to (i) comply with all applicable laws, statutes, ordinances and regulations related to use of the Licensed Materials. You may not use the Licensed Materials to engage in fraud or other illegal activity, or to infringe the intellectual property rights of others; and (ii) comply with the terms and conditions of all agreements you have with third parties, including providers of Marketplaces, as such terms and conditions relate to use of the Licensed Materials including, without limitation, terms and conditions related to types of items that may be sold or restrictions on concurrent sales. 

You agree not to (i) remove any copyright or other proprietary notice from the Applications; (ii) sublicense or transfer the Licensed Materials to a third party; (iii) use the Licensed Materials to provide services to any third party; (iv) reproduce, modify, translate or create any derivative work of all or any portion of the Licensed Materials; (v) sell, rent, lease, loan provide, distribute or otherwise transfer all or any portion of the Licensed Materials; (vi) reverse engineer, reverse assemble or otherwise attempt to gain access to the source code of all or any portion of the Licensed Materials; (vii) use any device, software or routine to interfere or attempt to interfere with the proper working of the Licensed Materials or any transaction conducted using the Licensed Materials; (viii) take any action that imposes an unreasonable or disproportionately large load on BONFIRE's infrastructure or limits BONFIRE's ability to provide the Licensed Materials; and (ix) cause or permit any third party to do any of the foregoing.

You agree that BONFIRE and its licensors retain all right, title and interest in the Licensed Materials and all copies of the Licensed Materials, including all copyrights therein. You agree to erase the Licensed Materials from your wireless device upon receipt of a notice from BONFIRE requesting that you do so.

DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES

THE LICENSED MATERIALS ARE PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS. BONFIRE MAKES NO REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS, IMPLIED OR STATUTORY. BONFIRE SPECIFICALLY DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION:
(i) THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT;
(ii) THAT THE SITE OR THE SERVICES WILL MEET YOUR REQUIREMENTS, WILL ALWAYS BE AVAILABLE, ACCESSIBLE, UNINTERRUPTED, TIMELY, SECURE OR OPERATE WITHOUT ERROR;
(iii) ANY IMPLIED WARRANTY ARISING FROM COURSE OF DEALING OR USAGE OF TRADE; AND
(iv) ANY OBLIGATION, LIABILITY, RIGHT, CLAIM OR REMEDY IN TORT, WHETHER OR NOT ARISING FROM THE NEGLIGENCE OF BONFIRE OR OUR SUPPLIERS OR DISTRIBUTORS.

YOU HEREBY ACKNOWLEDGE THAT SECURITY SAFEGUARDS, BY THEIR NATURE, ARE CAPABLE OF CIRCUMVENTION AND BONFIRE DOES NOT AND CANNOT GUARANTEE THAT YOUR DATA OR OTHER INFORMATION CANNOT BE ACCESSED BY UNAUTHORIZED PERSONS CAPABLE OF OVERCOMING SUCH SAFEGUARDS. YOU ACKNOWLEDGE AND AGREE THAT BONFIRE DOES NOT OPERATE OR CONTROL THE INTERNET AND THAT: (I) VIRUSES, WORMS, TROJAN HORSES, OR OTHER UNDESIRABLE DATA OR SOFTWARE; OR (II) UNAUTHORIZED USERS (E.G., HACKERS) MAY ATTEMPT TO OBTAIN ACCESS TO AND DAMAGE THE LICENSED MATERIALS AND/OR YOUR DATA. BONFIRE SHALL NOT BE RESPONSIBLE FOR SUCH ACTIVITIES. 

Some states do not allow the disclaimer of implied warranties, so the foregoing disclaimer may not fully apply to you. You may also have other legal rights which vary from state to state.

GENERAL RELEASE

BECAUSE BONFIRE IS NOT INVOLVED IN DEALINGS BETWEEN OUR USERS OR BETWEEN OUR USERS AND MARKETPLACE USERS, IF A DISPUTE ARISES BETWEEN YOU AND ANOTHER PARTY, YOU RELEASE BONFIRE (AND ITS AGENTS AND EMPLOYEES, SUPPLIERS AND DISTRIBUTORS) FROM CLAIMS, DEMANDS AND DAMAGES (ACTUAL AND CONSEQUENTIAL) OF EVERY KIND AND NATURE, KNOWN AND UNKNOWN, SUSPECTED AND UNSUSPECTED, DISCLOSED AND UNDISCLOSED, ARISING OUT OF OR IN ANY WAY CONNECTED WITH SUCH DISPUTES. FURTHER, YOU WAIVE ANY RIGHTS YOU MAY HAVE UNDER CALIFORNIA CIVIL CODE ? 1542 (OR ANY OTHER SIMILAR STATUTE) WHICH STATES: "A GENERAL RELEASE DOES NOT EXTEND TO CLAIMS WHICH THE CREDITOR DOES NOT KNOW OR SUSPECT TO EXIST IN HIS FAVOR A THE TIME OF EXECUTING THE RELEASE, WHICH IF KNOWN BY HIM MUST HAVE MATERIALLY AFFECTED HIS SETTLEMENT WITH THE DEBTOR."
YOU ACKNOWLEDGE AND AGREE THAT BONFIRE IS NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR THE AVAILABILITY OF MARKETPLACES, AND DOES NOT ENDORSE AND IS NOT RESPONSIBLE OR LIABLE FOR ANY SERVICES, CONTENT, ADVERTISING, PRODUCTS OR OTHER MATERIALS ON OR AVAILABLE FROM SUCH MARKETPLACES. YOU AGREE THAT BONFIRE SHALL NOT BE RESPONSIBLE OR LIABLE, DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY, FOR ANY DAMAGE OR LOSS CAUSED OR ALLEGED TO BE CAUSED BY OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE USE OF OR RELIANCE ON ANY SUCH SERVICES, CONTENT, ADVERTISING, PRODUCTS OR OTHER MATERIALS.
YOU ACKNOWLEDGE AND AGREE THAT BONFIRE DOES NOT CONTROL AND IS NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR INFORMATION PROVIDED BY OTHER USERS WHICH IS MADE AVAILABLE ON THE SITE. YOU MAY FIND OTHER USER'S INFORMATION TO BE OFFENSIVE, HARMFUL, INACCURATE OR DECEPTIVE. YOU AGREE THAT BONFIRE SHALL NOT BE RESPONSIBLE OR LIABLE, DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY, FOR ANY DAMAGE OR LOSS CAUSED OR ALLEGED TO BE CAUSED BY OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE USE OF OR RELIANCE ON ANY SUCH INFORMATION.

LIMITATIONS OF LIABILITY

TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES WILL BONFIRE BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, PUNITIVE OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES EVEN IF BONFIRE HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITIES OF SUCH DAMAGES. THIS INCLUDES, WITHOUT LIMITATION, LOSS OF DATA, CONTENT, FILES, PROFIT OR GOODWILL, OR THE COSTS OF PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES, ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THIS AGREEMENT, THE LICENSED MATERIALS, THE INABILITY TO USE THE LICENSED MATERIALS OR THOSE RESULTING FROM ANY GOODS OR SERVICES PURCHASED OR OBTAINED OR MESSAGES RECEIVED OR TRANSACTIONS ENTERED INTO THROUGH THE LICENSED MATERIALS. TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, IN NO EVENT WILL BONFIRE'S LIABILITY FOR ANY CLAIM, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE), OR ANY OTHER THEORY OF LIABILITY, EXCEED THE FEE PAID BY YOU FOR THE LICENSED MATERIALS. SOME STATES DO NOT ALLOW THE LIMITATION OF LIABILITY, SO THE FOREGOING LIMITATION MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU. 

BONFIRE will not be liable for any loss that results from a cause over which that entity does not have direct control. Such causes include, but are not limited to: (i) the failure of electronic or mechanical equipment or communication lines; (ii) wireless device or other interconnect problems; (iii) bugs, errors, configuration problems with the wireless device causing incompatibility with the Licensed Materials; (iv) the failure or unavailability of Internet access; (v) problems with wireless Internet service providers or other equipment or services relating to your wireless device or network; (vi) problems with intermediate computer or communications networks or facilities; (vii) problems with data transmission facilities of your wireless service; or (viii) unauthorized access, theft, operator errors, severe weather, earthquakes, other natural disasters or labor disputes. BONFIRE is also not responsible for any damage to your wireless device or other property resulting in any way from your use of the Licensed Materials.

INDEMNITY

You hereby agree to, at your own expense, indemnity, defend and hold BONFIRE and our subsidiaries, affiliates, officers, directors, agents, and employees harmless from and against any loss, cost, damages, liability, or expense arising out of or relating to (a) a third-party claim, action or allegation of infringement, misuse or misapropriation based on information, data, files or other content submitted by you using the Licensed Materials; (b) any fraud, manipulation, or other breach of this Agreement by you; (c) any third-party claim, action or allegation brought against BONFIRE arising out of or relating to a dispute with you over the terms and conditions of an agreement or related to the purchase or sale of any goods or services; (d) your violation of any law or the rights of a third party; or (e) your use, or BONFIRE's provision, of the Licensed Materials or use of your account by any third party. BONFIRE will have the right to participate in its defense and hire counsel of its choice, at your expense. You will not settle any action or claims on BONFIRE's behalf without the prior written consent of BONFIRE.

TERMINATION

Without limiting other remedies, BONFIRE may immediately issue a warning, temporarily suspend, indefinitely suspend, or terminate your access to the Licensed Materials if you breach any of the terms of this Agreement or if you take any actions that, in our sole judgment, may cause legal liability for or claims against you, our users, or us. In the event BONFIRE suspends or terminates your access to the Licensed Materials, you agree to immediately erase any Licensed Materials from your wireless device. All provisions of this Agreement that by their nature should survive termination shall survive termination, including, without limitation, provisions related to intellectual property, warranty disclaimers, general releases, limitations of liability, indemnity and the general provisions.

TRADEMARKS

Bonfire Media and Pocket Auctions are trademarks or registered trademarks of BONFIRE. All rights reserved.

GOVERNMENT

Government: If you are or are acting on behalf of an agency or an instrumentality of the United States government, the Applications are "commerical computer software" developed exclusively at private expense. Persuant to FAR 12.212 or DFARS 227 7202 and their successors, as applicable, use, reproduction and disclosure of the Applications is governed by the terms of this agreement.

Export: The Services and the Applications are subject to the export control laws and regulations of the United States and other jurisdictions. You agree to comply with all such laws and regulations.

MISCELLANEOUS

This Agreement is governed by the laws of the State of California, USA, without regard to California's conflict of law principles. The United Nations Convention on Contract for the Sale of International Goods does not apply to this Agreement. If any provision hereof is held illegal, invalid, or enforceable, in whole or in part, such provision shall be modifed to the minimum extent necessary to make it legal, valid and enforceable, and the legality, validity and enforceability of all other provisions of this Agreement shall not be affected thereby. This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between you and BONFIRE regarding its subject matter and supercedes any prior agreement, whether written or oral, relating to the subject matter of this Agreement. No modification or alteration of this Agreement will be valid except in writing signed by you and BONFIRE.
